```{r setup}
library(fishvice)
```

```{r}
run <- "BW_2020"
fit <- sam_get_fit(run)
rbx <- sam_rbx(fit)
```

```{r}
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, fig.width=7}
rbx$rbya %>% 
  mutate(yc = year - age) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, oC, fill = factor(yc))) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_col() +
  facet_grid(age ~ ., scales = "free_y") +
  scale_fill_crayola() +
  theme(legend.position = "false") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL,
       title = "Catch in numbers by age and yearclass")
```


```{r, fig.width = 7}
rbx$rby %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  theme_bw() +
  geom_ribbon(aes(year, ymin = low, ymax = high),
              fill = "grey") +
  geom_line(aes(year, est)) +
  facet_wrap(~ variable, scales = "free_y") +
  expand_limits(y = 0) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL,
       tile = "Stock summary")
```
